title: cloud-dev stop script prints "starting" instead of "stopping" servers
description:
Trivial patch.  Running ./stop.sh 4, prints things like:
"starting example2"
when it should display
"stopping example2"

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: I've also got a fix for this as part of a script overhaul I did for replica failover. Trivial if this goes in first though.  I'll try and get that patch posted tomorrow though.
